definition: the people's livelihood is reduced to destitution (idiom); a time of famine and impoverishment
to value the broom as one's own (idiom); to attach value to sth because it is one's own/a sentimental attachment
to toss away like a pair of worn-out shoes (idiom)
to throw away like worn out shoes
to care nothing for worldly fame and glory (idiom)
lit. my worn-out broom, a thousand in gold (idiom); fig. sentimental value/I wouldn't be parted with it for anything.
to regard like a pair of worn-out shoes/to look on sth as worthless

sentences.english: Please accept our company's  deep apology for this.
sentences.chinese: 请接受敝公司对此事所造成之不便的深深歉意。

sentences.english: We thank you for your consideration in making us the consignment of 30 bales of cotton goods.
sentences.chinese: 贵方欲委托敝公司销售棉织品30包，我方不胜感激。

sentences.english: Ours is a well-known store and our goods are always dependable.
sentences.chinese: 这只手镯是敝店热门货之一。

sentences.english: A copy of our illustrated catalogue is being sent to you today, with samples of our products.
sentences.chinese: 现寄上敝公司产品目录表与样品。

sentences.english: We'll effect delivery within two weeks after receipt of your order.
sentences.chinese: 收到贵公司的订单后，敝公司将在两周内发货。

sentences.english: You know what my services are worth better than I do .
sentences.chinese: 对于敝人作工的价值您比俺更清楚。

sentences.english: Let me reiterate our sincere regret regarding these problems.
sentences.chinese: 请允许敝公司重申对此问题的诚摰歉意。

sentences.english: Flake structure is a typical non-Gaussian phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 片状结构是一种典型的非高斯敝斑现象。

sentences.english: We have been engaged in this business for the past 20 years.
sentences.chinese: 敝公司从事这个亦竹已经有廿年的经验。

sentences.english: We are national next move plan to ascend the moon within several years.
sentences.chinese: 我们国产业敝位步希图正在几年内登梢球。

sentences.english: A barium aluminate concrete and fancy face brick are used for radioactive rays shielding protection.
sentences.chinese: 用于放射线屏敝防护的钡铝酸盐混凝土及其装饰面砖。

sentences.english: This is a more or less normal process, as everything is circular.
sentences.chinese: 那是一样平常有当敝象，每件事皆是环恍肃扣。

sentences.english: We want to exchange beef and mutton for your cotton.
sentences.chinese: 敝公司想用牛羊肉换贵公司的棉花。

sentences.english: I an glad that you have accepted my offer.
sentences.chinese: 敝人欣闻您已接受我的报价。

sentences.english: At present we are interested in your goods.
sentences.chinese: 敝公司目前对贵公司的商品极有爱好。

sentences.english: From both structures and applying electronegativity, ionization energy, stability of carbon ion and electron shield effect, the author approaches the addition difference between the two.
sentences.chinese: 碳离子稳定性，电子屏敝效应探讨了二者的加成差异。

definition: lit. your honored carriage/your highness/honored Sir (also sarcastic)/you
poor monk (humble term used by monk of himself)
benefactor (term used by a monk to address a layperson)/donor (semiconductor)
